origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicAnalysisAPI.fetch_articles', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest analysis articles on a specified economic topic.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The economic topic to fetch articles about.'}, {'name': 'number_of_articles', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of articles to fetch.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of articles related to the specified economic topic.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicAnalysisAPI.fetch_articles, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'global economic trends', 'number_of_articles'是'5'.
